message:
SYSTEM: 2013-09_DanielNuest-at-OEG.pdf: Página 40
Daniel Nüst @ OEG, UPM Madrid, October 2013 
40 
Google Summer of Code 
What is it? 
http://www.google-melange.com/ 
 
 
Experiences at 52°North (http://52north.org/gsoc) 
• Great personal experience 
• Good results (depending on mentor engagement) 
• Can be used for “housekeeping” if student is good, 
or for experimental things 
• “worth the time/money” 
 
Potentially host your projects next year (IF we get in 
as a mentoring org again) ? "... the more code out there, the more everyone benefits."
speaker: SYSTEM
